description: Try our easy to follow The Croods Devilled Chicken Wings recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Chicken wings,Seafood free,Low salt,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,High protein,High fibre,Soy free,Chicken,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: The Croods Devilled Chicken Wings Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Combine flour, sugar and spices in a snap-lock bag. Add chicken. Seal bag and shake well to coat. Arrange wings, in a single layer, in a pan lined with baking paper. Spray with oil. Spread potato on a tray. Bake wings and wedges for 30 minutes or until golden.

Meanwhile, heat oil in a saucepan over medium heat. Add onion and cook for 5 minutes until softened. Add garlic, capsicum and sauces and simmer for 10 minutes until thickened. Serve chicken wings with sauce and coleslaw. Top with herbs.
